entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can't "Pair to Mac" > Problem with Xamarin Website? #24809
  • App crashes on launch during Apple App Review (iOS 18.0 - iPad Air 5th Generation) #24805
  • Add OnBindingContextChanging #24804
  • net8 sr9 Win Platform Release Mode Memory leak when multiple windows get closed #24803
    .NET 9 Planning
  • net8 sr9 Win Platform Memory leak when multiple windows get closed #24802
  • Add FontScale property to IFontElement #24800
  • FlyoutItemIsVisible property in Shell Items is always true #24797

Closed

  • Library not loaded: @rpath/AppThinning.framework/Versions/A/AppThinning (Xcode 16) #24799
  • [Windows] CollectionView Infinite Scroll Bug : Scroll Resets to First Item at End #24578
    Backlog
  • [iOS] [8.0.90] Images not showing up #24784
  • Regression Alert! Shadow parameters got factored?! Danger to production apps! #24773

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    community ✨
  • Fix ShellContent Title doesn't observe changes to bound properties #24806
    community ✨
  • Improve TextToSpeech function by adding a speech rate parameter #24798
    community ✨

Updated

  • [iOS] Tab Selected Icon Color not changing if using Font icons - fix #22437
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • [iOS] Custom font icon is not rendered in a shell tabbar tab #24721
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Improve measure invalidation and legacy Layout(s) performance #24532
    area-layout, community ✨
  • Fix Text entry border disappear when changing to/from dark mode in Android #24433
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • Fix Provided consistent behavior of text color in tabbed page in all platforms. #24782
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • Fix Frame offsets inner content view by 1pt #24582
    community ✨, area-controls-frame, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper
  • [Android] Fix for Scrolling of Editor placed in ScollView issue #24531
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Android] Fix Flickering issue when calling Navigation.PopAsync #24713
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, community ✨
  • Fixed NavigationPage Title property #24781
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Port all remaining Xamarin.UITest tests to Appium #24153
    area-testing
  • Improve keyboard scrolling with editors, contentInsets, and different keyboards #24589
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-entry, area-controls-scrollview, area-keyboard
  • Improve MauiFactory performance by avoiding reflection to get base classes #24775
    area-core-hosting, community ✨
  • [Windows] Handle focus events using `FocusManager` (take 2) #24695
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-keyboard, t/perf
  • [net9.0] Update merge main net9 #24759
    area-infrastructure
  • IndicatorView with DataTemplate - improvements #24776
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-activityindicator
  • Adding items to windows ObservableItemTemplateCollection #24777
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #24691
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [Android] Entry & Picker VerticalTextAlignment ignored #21966
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-controls-picker
  • [Windows] Bump `Microsoft.Web.WebView2` from `1.0.2592.51` to `1.0.2739.15` #24329
    area-infrastructure, community ✨
  • Android Ecosystem updates for `net9.0-rc.2` #24665
    do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
  • NavigationBarColors from NavigationPage not changing on AppTheme changing - fix #24766
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
